titleStmt.title: Samsons seaven lockes of haire allegorically expounded, and compared to the seauen spirituall vertues, whereby we are able to ouercome our spirituall Philistims. By M. A. Symson, minister of the euangell at Dalkeith.
titleStmt.author: Simson, Archibald, 1564-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Edward Raban, printer to the Vniversitie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
